name: Hardrock Sex 3D
description:
Get ready to rock this night with Hardrock Sex 3D!
Hardrock Sex 3D is a visual novel game with 3D animated sex scenes. Meet our characters, discover their story and explore all the hot scenes they are to offer.
On top of our visual novel, there is a unique guess-the-note music mechanics waiting for you. Hear a couple of notes playing, guess them correctly and pass the levels to be surprised with amazing arts and videos with our female protagonists. We are waiting to polish your unique music skills!Features:
3 hot and attractive female protagonists
3D visual novel
rock-n-roll atmosphere
5 realistic 3D sex scenes
Let’s get it started!
